content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Furnace at position (1, 1)
Consists of the following entities:
- Stone furnace (position (1, 1)) with fuel (coal) and currently processing copper-ore into copper-plate.

### Wooden chests
Consists of the following entities:
- Wooden chest (position (3.5, 1.5)) containing 20 iron-plates.
- Wooden chest (position (3.5, 3.5)) containing 50 iron-plates.
- Wooden chest (position (3.5, 5.5)) with no items.

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when crafting items due to insufficient ingredients
- Ensure you have enough required ingredients in your inventory before attempting to craft items. In this case, ensure you have enough copper-plates to craft Automation Science Packs.

### Errors when inserting items into a full inventory
- Check the inventory of the target entity (like a furnace) before inserting items. If the inventory is full, you will not be able to insert additional items.

### Errors when attempting to insert items that are not available
- Make sure you have the required items in your inventory before attempting to insert them into another entity. In this case, ensure you have copper-ore before trying to insert it into the furnace.

### Errors when attempting to insert incompatible items
- Verify that the item you are trying to insert is compatible with the target entity's inventory. In this case, ensure you are not trying to insert copper-ore into a furnace that already contains iron-ore.
